info.name: butterfly parallel sort  3
info.description:
[ restart if texture not there ]
butterfly sort is one of the most efficient in parallelism ( log²(n)  step to sort n numbers )
see p113 [url]https://airccse.org/journal/ijdps/papers/3612ijdps09.pdf[/url]
Color sort variant: see header.

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
// cf https://www.academia.edu/77537224/Parallel_butterfly_sorting_algorithm_on_GPU
// color sort: switch #inf line 6  and  del .rrr line 11

#define tex(i)   ivec2( (i) % n , (i) / n )
#define inf(A,B) ( (A).x < (B).x )
//#define inf(A,B) (  A.x == B.x ? A.y == B.y ? A.z == B.z ? A.w < B.w : A.z < B.z : A.y < B.y : A.x < B.x  )

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy;
    if ( iFrame < 1 ) { O = textureSize(iChannel1,0).x > 1 // init array
                            ? texture(iChannel1, u/R ).rrrr
                            : vec4(fract(1e4*sin(dot(u,R-17.)))); // fallback if texture not loaded
                        return; }                     
    O = T(u);                                         // last state 
    R = exp2(floor(log2(R))); 
    if ( u.x > R.x || u.y > R.y ) return;             // power-of-2 image only
    int m = int(log2(R.x*R.y));
    if ( iFrame >= ((m+1)*(m+2))/2 ) return;          // sort finished
 // if ( iFrame > n ) return;                         // min-max finished
    
    ivec2 I = ivec2(u);
    int n = int(R.x), 
        i = I.x+ n*I.y,                               // 2D → linear index
#if 0                                                 // min-max butterfly:
        f = iFrame,
#else                                                 // full butterfly:
        F = iFrame, 
        t = int(.5+.5*sqrt(float(1+8*F))),            // build t = 1  2    3      4
        f = (t*(t+1))/2 - F,                          //       f = 1, 2 1, 3 2 1, 4 3 2 1
#endif
        d = 1<<f,                                     // butterfly span
        l = t==f ?  (d/2)-1 - 2*(i%(d/2))  :          // phase1. get twin side (i.e. offset to other) in the span 
            i%d < d/2 ? d/2 : -d/2;                   // phase2

    vec4 T = T( tex(i + l) );                         // twin value to compare with
    if ( inf(O,T) != l > 0 ) O = T;                   // if ill sorted, swap
    
}
